name: TheOpinionMinion
0:
”Alexa, Ask The Opinion Minion to compliment me”
”Alexa, Tell The Opinion Minion to make me smile”
”Alexa, Ask The Opinion Minion to make me cry”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the opinion minion
des:
The Opinion Minion is a skill that will give you creative insults or compliments. Laugh, cry or smile, it's only an ask away.

Give it a go and find new and creative ways to tell someone you admire them. Or deflate your ego by asking The Opinion Minion to knock you down a peg or two
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
